descriptionlist.description: Install emojiport and the latest emojis in one package! Must have the poomstmart emojiport repo in your sources. I Used elements of the source of minimal hosts blocker to make this project. Open sourced on github.
Don't try to use this on meridan.

changelog.change: Updated emoji file (Now has all emojis from 12.1, instead of the ones from just 12.1 beta 1)
